entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
